name: Tea
description:
Munnar is a city in the Western Ghats mountain range in the Kerala state of India. It is a mountain town and a former British Raj exclusive tourist center, surrounded by rolling hills covered with tea plantations that were established in the late 19th century. Here women harvest tea covered by layers of canvas that protect them from contact with herbicides. It is common the cases of cancer and diseases of the skin as well as respiratory, also malformations in children. We can talk with they with the help of an hindi interpreter.
This pic is part of "Portraits of India" collection, and belongs to a small serie of two with a portrait of one hearvest lady. 
3200x2133
